decks.notes: This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on fast and aggressive gameplay with a mix of creature removal and hand disruption. The aim is to control the board early on with cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push, while building up a strong board presence with creatures like Bloodtithe Harvester and Vein Ripper. Utilizing cards like Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger and Sorin, Imperious Bloodlord to drain life from the opponent adds another layer of pressure. The deck also includes some control elements like Duress and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse to keep opponents on the back foot.

This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and various removal spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent and secure early victories. Key cards like Bloodtithe Harvester and Vein Ripper provide strong on-board presence, while cards like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize maintain control over the game. Sorin, Imperious Bloodlord provides additional creature support and can push damage through, while cards like Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse offer powerful late-game threats. With a mix of creatures, removal spells, and disruption, this deck aims to pressure the opponent and close out games efficiently.

The deck focuses on assembling a combo involving Amalia Life and Aetherflux Reservoir to gain a large amount of life and then use Chord of Calling to search for key combo pieces. The deck also utilizes cards like Collected Company to develop board presence and cards like Selfless Savior for protection. The mana base is designed to support the combo pieces and ensure consistency in executing the combo. Overall, the deck's strategy revolves around generating a high life total and using it to win the game through Aetherflux Reservoir.

The main concept of this deck is to build a strong and aggressive board presence using Spirit creatures and support spells, focusing on tempo and disruption. The deck aims to control the battlefield with cards like Spell Queller and Skyclave Apparition while applying pressure with cards like Supreme Phantom and Mausoleum Wanderer. The inclusion of Wedding Announcement and Invasion of Gobakhan provides additional support and utility. The mana base is designed to support the aggressive playstyle while still maintaining consistency. Overall, the deck is designed to overwhelm opponents quickly and efficiently.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through countering spells, removing threats, and generating card advantage with cards like Narset, Parter of Veils and Memory Deluge. It also uses lands like Field of Ruin and Deserted Beach to disrupt the opponent's mana base. The inclusion of Kaheera, the Orphanguard as a companion provides additional value to the deck. The ultimate goal is to outlast the opponent by managing resources effectively and grinding out a victory through attrition.

The main idea of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells, utilizing the synergy between cards like Aloe Alchemist, Burning-Tree Emissary, and Reckless Bushwhacker to quickly build a strong board presence. The deck aims to deal fast, consistent damage to the opponent while also having control options like Break Out and Monstrous Rage to handle threats. The mana base is focused on providing consistent access to the necessary colors and ensuring a smooth curve for optimal aggression.
